title: Gullah/Geechee Cultural Heritage Corridor: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Operating Hours & Seasons       The Gullah Geechee Cultural Heritage Corridor is home to a wide variety of historic places, cultural sites, com- munity festivals and heritage tours.  For more information about what to do, and how to get there, please visit www.gullahgeecheecorridor.org.  The Gullah Geechee Cultural Heritage Corridor Commission office is located at: 2817 Maybank Highway Johns Island, SC 29457 Office number: (843) 818-4587 Fax number: (843) 793-1007 Operational Hours: Monday - Friday 9:00am - 5:00pm
